title: sonic reality drum and bass rex files
description:
It?s time for authentic European Drum and Bass. Get all the ravers on the floor with high-speed breakbeats and blistering, distorted bass lines. Mix and match beats and grooves with adjustable tempos for endless Drum and Bass combinationS. This Style Pak contains a broad range of high-energy loops created by Paul Kodish, Brian Dillman and the team of Q Up Arts and Sonic Reality.

This collection includes over 500 authentic loops (each in Rex, Apple Loops and Acidized Wave formats) in the styles of progressive Drum and Bass, Jungle, IDM and more.

Contents:

    * 29 Drum and Bass Construction Kits
    * Over 60 Synth and Bass Lines
    * Over 180 Raw Beats and Percussion
    * Over 250 High Energy Instruments and Effects
    * Tempos: 124bpm-171bpm

inspired by artytorrents...
